name: Let's make... sports
description:
Dasha is a 1st-course student, and the increased scholarship is almost in her pocket ... but her sport education teacher has other plans. For did not have to truant a fisycal culture lessons for all year!

The story is based on the story of the creative association K.O.V.SH.
Kinetic visual novel with colorful graphics and atmospheric soundtrack.

Disclamer: All characters are 18 year atleast
